name: Chemtrailing
description:
Control a plane that spreads a mind control drug over the US. Infect as many people as possible within 15 seconds.

More info about the chemtrail conspiracy theory:

  • Wikipedia: Chemtrail conspiracy theory
  • RationalWiki: Chemtrails

Created for the GDS Jam 2020. Theme: Disinformation and conspiracy theories

Controls
  • Steer: left and right
  • Slow down: down
Sources

  • City data: https://simplemaps.com/data/us-cities
